id: Notion Wheel Of Life Worksheet Template
name: Notion Wheel Of Life Worksheet Template
description: Learn about the wheel of life, a tool for assessing life balance and satisfaction! Use this worksheet for personal review or for client assessmentsTrack check ins and transformation over timeIncludes helpful questions for introspection or for guiding a client (inside the "Domain Questions" toggle of a Check In)Part of the Notion life coaching tools series (more coming soon!)To copy and modify this template, you will first need to set up an account on Notion.
features: Use this worksheet for personal review or for client assessments; Track check ins and transformation over time; Includes helpful questions for introspection or for guiding a client (inside the "Domain Questions" toggle of a Check In)
